languages.text: {n}Откашлявшись и продемонстрировав регалии дознавателя, Хейнрикс властно заявляет:{/n} "От лица конклава Коронус я уведомляю династию Чорда, что личным приказом Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус помещен{mf||а} под опеку Инквизиции. Покушения на е{mf|го|е} безопасность будут рассматриваться как вмешательство в деятельность Инквизиции".

{n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: {n}Откашлявшись и продемонстрировав регалии дознавателя, Хейнрикс властно заявляет:{/n} "От лица конклава Коронус я уведомляю династию Чорда, что личным приказом Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус помещен{mf||а} под опеку Инквизиции. Покушения на е{mf|го|е} безопасность будут рассматриваться как вмешательство в деятельность Инквизиции".

languages.text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，展示了他的审讯官玫瑰结，随后以命令的语气宣布道。{/n}“我在此代表科罗努斯审判庭，告知库尔达家族的行商浪人。根据大审判官卡尔卡扎的命令，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人目前置于审判庭的监管下。任何威胁{mf|他|她}人身安全的攻击行为，都会被审判庭视为干涉事务的僭越举动。”
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，展示了他的审判官玫瑰结，随后以命令的语气宣布道。{/n}“我在此代表科罗努斯审判庭，告知库尔达家族的行商浪人。根据卡尔卡扎审判长的命令，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人目前置于审判庭的监管下。任何威胁{mf|他|她}人身安全的攻击行为，都会被审判庭视为干涉事务的僭越举动。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}咳払いをしインテロゲイターの衣類を着用した後、ハインリックスは余儀なく声を上げた。{/n}「コロヌス評議会を代表し、カルカサルロード・インクィジターの命令により、自由開拓者、チョーダ家に通告する。自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、異端審問庁に身柄を拘束された。{mf|彼|彼女}の安全を脅かす行為は、異端審問庁への妨害行為と見なす」
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}咳払いをしインテロゲイターの衣類を着用した後、ハインリックスは余儀なく声を上げた。{/n}「コロヌス評議会を代表し、カルカサルロード・インクィジターの命令により、自由開拓者、チョーダ家に通告する。自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、異端審問庁に身柄を拘束された。{mf|彼|彼女}の安全を脅かす行為は、異端審問庁への妨害行為と見なす」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Después de aclararse la garganta y presentar sus galas de interrogador, Heinrix pronuncia imperativamente:{/n} «En nombre del cónclave Koronus, por la presente informo a la casa Chorda de comerciantes independientes de que, por orden del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius ha sido puest{mf|o|a} bajo custodia de la inquisición. Cualquier ataque a su seguridad será tratado como un acto de interferencia en los asuntos de la inquisición».
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de aclararse la garganta y presentar sus galas de interrogador, Heinrix pronuncia imperativamente:{/n} «En nombre del cónclave Koronus, por la presente informo a la casa Chorda de comerciantes independientes de que, por orden del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius ha sido puest{mf|o|a} bajo custodia de la inquisición. Cualquier ataque a su seguridad será tratado como un acto de interferencia en los asuntos de la inquisición.
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nachdem Heinrix sich geräuspert und seine Interrogator-Insignien präsentiert hat, verkündet er gebieterisch:{/n} "Im Namen der Koronus-Konklave informiere ich das Freihändlerhaus Chorda, dass {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius auf Befehl des Großinquisitors Calcazar in die Obhut der Inquisition übergeben wurde. Jeder Angriff auf {mf|seine|ihre} Sicherheit ist als Akt der Einmischung in die Angelegenheiten der Inquisition zu werten."
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem Heinrix sich geräuspert und seine Interrogator-Insignien präsentiert hat, verkündet er gebieterisch:{/n} "Im Namen der Koronus-Konklave informiere ich das Freihändlerhaus Chorda, dass {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius auf Befehl des Großinquisitors Calcazar in die Obhut der Inquisition übergeben wurde. Jeder Angriff auf {mf|seine|ihre} Sicherheit ist als Akt der Einmischung in die Angelegenheiten der Inquisition zu werten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après s'être raclé la gorge et avoir présenté son insigne d'interrogateur, Heinrix annonce d'une voix impérieuse :{/n} « Au nom du Conclave de Koronus, j'informe la maison Chorda que, par ordre du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius est sous la garde de l'Inquisition. Toute atteinte à sa personne et à sa sécurité sera traitée comme un acte d'ingérence dans les affaires de l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après s'être raclé la gorge et avoir présenté son insigne d'interrogateur, Heinrix annonce d'une voix impérieuse :{/n} « Au nom du Conclave de Koronus, j'informe la maison Chorda que, par ordre du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius est sous la garde de l'Inquisition. Toute atteinte à sa personne et à sa sécurité sera traitée comme un acte d'ingérence dans les affaires de l'Inquisition. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Boğazını temizledikten ve Sorguculuk ünvanını takdim ettikten sonra Heinrix, buyurgan bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Koronus Meclisi adına, Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın emriyle, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un Engizisyon'un koruması altına alındığı konusunda Chorda Hür Tacir Hanesi'ni bilgilendirmek vazifemdir. Onun güvenliğini tehlikeye atacak bir saldırı, Engizisyon'un meselelerine müdahale olarak değerlendirilecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat and presenting his Interrogator's regalia, Heinrix pronounces imperatively,{/n} "On behalf of the Koronus Conclave, I hereby inform Rogue Trader House Chorda that, by order of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, Rogue Trader von Valancius has been placed in the custody of the Inquisition. Any attack on {mf|his|her} safety is to be treated as an act of interference in the affairs of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Boğazını temizledikten ve Sorgucu'luk ünvanını takdim ettikten sonra Heinrix, buyurgan bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Koronus Meclisi adına, Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın emriyle, Hür Tacir von Valancius'un Engizisyon'un koruması altına alındığı konusunda Hür Tacir Hanesi Chorda'yı bilgilendirmek vazifemdir. Onun güvenliğini tehlikeye atacak bir saldırı, Engizisyon'un meselelerine müdahale etmek olarak değerlendirilecektir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
